appetizers.name: Spinach and Feta Cheese Samosa
appetizers.description: Mildly spices potatoes, fresh spinach, and feta cheese turnovers.

appetizers.name: Sesame Chicken Naan
appetizers.description: Naan stuffed with spiced chicken and topped with sesame seeds.

entrees.name: Aloo Daal Palak
entrees.description: Yellow lentils, potatoes, fresh spinach touch of garlic.

entrees.name: Kashmiri Chicken Kofta Curry
entrees.description: Minced chicken croquets cooked in a cashew cream sauce.

entrees.name: Lamb Mushroom do Piaza
entrees.description: Lamb cubes cooked with mushrooms, onions and green peppers in a thick sauce.

entrees.name: Seafood Masala
entrees.description: Shrimps, tilapia and scallops cooked in tikka masala sauce.

entrees.name: Tandoori Salmon Tikka
entrees.description: Fresh Chilean salmon fillets lightly marinated and cooked to perfection in the tandoor oven.
